Belle propriété, maison à étages,spacieuse & bien éclairée avec 4 chambres à coucher(poss.5em)dans un cul de sac,secteur familiar.Plancher de bois-franc, belle cuisine en bois,(2)salle de bain (granite),plusieurs rénovations effectuées au cours des années,cour intime paysagée,terr.6,000pi,proche de tout les services,près des écoles,parcs,autobus.

Most windows & doors changed. Updated Kitchen. Mostly wood strip floors. 2 Bathrooms. Ground level Family Room or 4th Bedroom next to garage. Close to schools, stores, BUS & TRAIN.

Large, magnificent patio overlooking backyard. Close proximity to various services, schools, train & public transport, highway 20/40. A must see!

realEstateSold.PublicRemarks: Located in most desirable area, this amazing semi-detached cottage is set on a beautifully manicured lot with a park just on the other side of the fence- therefore no neighbours in the back! Many renovations including new kitchen, new bathrooms, wood floors in living room, central a/c, central vacuum and much more. Schedule your visit today!

Sunny family home that features 4 spacious bedrooms, 2.5 baths , beautiful wood floors. Newer windows , heat pump , roof. Finished basement. Large fenced lot. Driveway can accommodate up to 6 cars. Prime Westpark location. Public transport at the door & a short drive to the commuter train. Close to schools , parks and all other amenities.
A bright and spacious split on a quiet street with a very large south facing backyard. Near Emile Nelligan and Academie Marie Claire,parks, cinema, restaurants, public transportation and highway 40.

Nice bungalow located in a good neighborhood. Close to all amenities. Beautiful backyard with no rear neighbours and backing on the golf course. Bright and sunny with lots of light from windows and patio door. This property offers great potential. Easy to show.

Fantastic opportunity to renovate to your taste! This solid family home features newer roof, heat pump & driveway plus 2 floor extension offering a main floor office and family room. realEstateSold.PublicRemarks: Impeccable bungalow located in a quiet area of Pierrefonds, on huge 11,000 sq.ft landscaped lot. 3+1 bdrs, 2 baths, fireplace, beautiful deck and garden surrounded with mature trees, finished basement with bdr and bath, laundry room and working room. Close to CLSC and Library, schools, public park and pool, buses. See addendum for renovations.

Move-In Ready.... Full brick 3 + 1 bedroom semi-detached cottage built in 2000 situated in a very desirable area. Steps to shopping, public transportation and much more. Great family home with many updates over the years. Come see for yourself!

Well located, 3 Bedroom, 1.5 bath, minutes to Fairview Mall & bus terminal. Quiet setting, close to Hermitage Park. Large playroom has woodstove, plenty of storage and Cedar closet. New bathroom (2012), new windows and doors(2014). Fenced backyard and carport. A must see!!! Quick occupancy possible.

Immaculate, well maintained home located on quiet street, walk to parks, schools - Emile Nelligan and Academie Marie Claire, cinema, shops, restaurants, public transportation and easy access to highway 40. Roof 2014, hot water tank 2013, furnace 2011, air condition 2011, garage door 2014. Many rooms include built-in furniture.

Situated in a high demand area of Pierrefonds. This home is zoned for the westpark elementary school and is at proximity of Beechwood school , High schools and the Pierrefonds library. This well cared for house is a must see on your part!

Beautifully updated spacious split level in PRIME Pointe Claire location.Kitchen and bathrooms have been redone(2013) with the addition of heated slate floors in the kitchen and bathroom including a bonus towel warmer. Newly sanded and varnished hardwood floors have been stained a warm brown and the entire house has been freshly painted.
Beautiful, renovated house with a huge lot,huge in ground swimming pool (heated), very serene.Child safe crescent.Wood burning fireplace, sun filled basement .Close to all.
